review: Only used this for a few days but overall, for the price, it's a really nice value. Set up was pretty easy. Navigation is not too hard either. Only minor complaint is that it seems like on some items, it's not clear whether it is free with your Prime Membership or whether you must pay a fee. You don't know for sure until you click on it and start down the path to view it.I'm happy with it. Was worried there would be lots of buffering issues since my Verizon FIOS network is less "speedy" than they tell you is. However, haven't yet run into any problems so far.
author: Carolyn Collins
